docs.snippet: Wednesday: An anniversary for a famous Louis Armstrong tune inspired by a Queens street, the Secret Science Club returns, and names to replace the MetroCard.

docs.snippet: A gunman who opened fire at a church in Antioch, Tenn., on Sunday shot himself and was in custody, the police said.
